channel.title: Javac on Pi4J
channel.description: Recent content in Javac on Pi4J

item.title: Building with javac
item.description:
You can build a Pi4J project using only java and javac.

Wiring

No wiring is needed for this minimal example as it only demonstrates how to create a minimal application which initializes Pi4J.

Java release

Any Java release over 11 is enough, check it with this command:

$ java -version
java 17.0.1 2021-10-19 LTS
Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 17.0.1+12-LTS-39)
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (build 17.0.1+12-LTS-39, mixed mode, sharing)

PI4J jar files

You will need to download the Pi4J distribution from the Maven repository:
